titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the beginning of Christ Short for memorie, plaine for capacity, deliuered almost in the expresse words of the text, for the more authority. By Samuell Hieron, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Samuel Macham, and Mat. Cooke, and are to be sold at their shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tygers head,

notesStmt.note: Closely cropped with some loss of printed marginal notes.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: their shop in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tygers head
